name: A customize HTML form directive implementation
description: It'a sample for a login form directive implement. I use just try the ng-model in directive and perform a isolate scope '&' for calling back to Controller

name: A Bootstrap List and Modal directives implementation
description: I list some 'Comment' datas in Bootstrap list and encapsulate it as a directive. if click each item on the list, will open a Bootstrap modal. As before, I create a directive to perform the modal

name: A BootStrap grid system directive implementation
description: I create a directive to perform a 'Product' grid system with bootstrap. This directive can be assign value for How many column in one row, default is 3

name: A pagnation directive implementation
description: I create a directive to perform a Bootstrap pagnation. You can using pagination element and give it a ng-model attribute to set the current page and using ng-change to listen the page change.

name: A AngularJS Controller Testing with Karma and Jasmine
description: I create a simple Controller and using Karma and Jasmine to test the controller. You can use 'node_modules/karma-cli/bin/karma start public/examples/L5/qa/karma.conf.js' to run lanuch a Karma test.

name: L6: A AngularJS dropDown directive implementation
description: I create a directive to perform a Bootstrap dropdown. Same as L4, You must give it a ng-model which means the current selection in this dropdown. Click live demo to see how to use.

name: A AngularJS Service Testing with Karma and Jasmine
description: I create a simple Controller & Service and use Karma and Jasmine to test the service. You can use 'node_modules/karma-cli/bin/karma start public/examples/L7/qa/karma.conf.js' to run lanuch a Karma test.

name: bsDropdown demo
description: It's an angular directive for bootstrap dropdown.See https://github.com/AllenFang/angular-bootstrap-dropdown
